products.title: Kerry Vibrant Pumpkin Roller Blind
products.description: The vibrant pumpkin is so bright and colourful that seeing it for the first time is like getting punched in the face. In a good way. Perfect for warming up any space, it dominates the room regardless of whether it is a stark white for a sharp contrast or warmer, redder tones for a more fiery palette. Totally blackout, the sun doesnt stand a chance of getting through, leaving you free from glare all day long.

products.title: Kerry Lemon Roller Blind
products.description: A yellow this bright has only ever been used for one thing; being the colour of bananas in cartoons. Now however, you can bring this rich, characterful and potassium filled energy into your home and tie it into a variety of colour schemes. As long as they aren't beige, that would just be gross. Being fully blackout, it is perfect for a kid's bedroom, as it will keep them asleep and in bed for a few more blissful moments of peace, right before they wake you up by jumping your bed.

products.title: Gibson Perfect White Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson perfect white is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the blind's hardwearing fabric is wipe-clean and fire retardant, so it can work in tricky spaces such as bathrooms and kitchens. Choose to have controls on either the left or right according to what best suits your layout.

products.title: Gibson Persian Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, teal blue coloured gibson persian blue would work brilliantly against a neutral background to help highlight the colour in this blind. This is a beautiful colour and great for anyone looking for a teal roller blind. Use this blind to lift and enhance a room - especially a bathroom as this 100% waterproof fabric can withstand anything thrown at it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Sky Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The light, sky blue colour is airy and gentle. Pair this with lighter decors or with rooms that have a blue theme to them. Additionally, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant. This roller blind is very versatile and can be installed in kitchens, bathrooms, living rooms and bedrooms - brilliant. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Navy Roller Blind
products.description: The dark gibson navy is the darkest blue colour in the range. Bordering on a purple colour, this fabric is great for anyone looking for a deep blue coloured roller blind. The durability of this blind means that it can be installed in bathrooms without fear of water damaging it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Sapphire Roller Blind
products.description: The lighter blue in the gibson sapphire is rich and bright. This is a great sky blue colour and is perfect for bathrooms or matching in with blue decors. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of colour. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson White Dove Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson white dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathroom. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it ideal for placing in a hot, steamy bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Azure Roller Blind
products.description: The royal tone in the gibson azure is a more refined, deeper colour. This is great for rooms that already have blue in them or need some darker colours added in. This is a very durable fabric that can be used in kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms. The gibson range is full of bright and bold colours. The fabric is very versatile, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant.

products.title: Gibson Granny Smith Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson granny smith is a lighter green colour, with hints of yellow to it. This lime green roller blind is great for making a statement in a room or drawing attention to the window. This will match in with yellow or green-focused decors and can also be used in bathrooms because of its moisture resistant properties. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Roller Blind
products.description: The pale purple gibson lilac mist is ideal for lighter rooms, or for pairing with light purple or blue furniture. Match this in with your bathroom towels to create a coherent colour in the bathroom. Being 100% waterproof makes this blind perfect for installing in your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Crimson Roller Blind
products.description: Our range of dimout fabrics are perfect for gently filtering the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy without blocking too much of the light from getting in. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Gibson Powder Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The light gibson powder grey is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor. The lighter grey will help enhance and lift the room. Use this in any room in your home as it is fire retardant and 100% moisture resistant - ideal for bathrooms. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Pewter Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson pewter is a dark grey coloured roller blind, pair this against lighter decors to make a statement in the room. The dark colour pairs well with darker decors too, but throw something light in there to keep the mood up. This blind looks brilliant in a bathroom, and being 100% waterproof makes it the perfect addition to your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Bubblegum Roller Blind
products.description: The rich pink colour in the gibson bubblegum is ideal for rooms that need some life in them. The bright pink colour is great for lighter environments or rooms with a red/pink tone to them. This colour won't fade into the background and will be at the centre of attention in any room. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Lace Roller Blind
products.description: The light cream coloured gibson lace roller blind is a brilliant neutral fabric. This is ideal for neutral toned rooms or to help lighten a corner of a dark room. This fabric can be installed in any room and is 100% waterproof, so don't worry about installing this in a bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Blonde Roller Blind
products.description: The yellow gibson blonde is a light toned blind, the bright yellow colour is great or adding colour to a room or for a bathroom as it is 100% waterproof - perfect for placing right next to the shower. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Gibson Egg Shell Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson egg shell is a light, bright fabric. Use this to help lighten a room and help to make it feel bigger. The light colour will pair with any decor and this blind is suitable for any room in the home - especially bathrooms. The 100% pvc fabric is fully waterproof, meaning that it can be installed right next to a shower without worry about damaging the fabric. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Aubergine Roller Blind
products.description: The deep berry purple tones in the gibson aubergine are great for pairing with darker environments. This is a blind that can be installed in any room without worry about damage. Use this blind in rooms that are lacking in character and colour. The fabric is very versatile, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Jet Black Roller Blind
products.description: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower.
